website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you are looking for a panel room divider at a reasonable price, but be aware that it provides more decorative appeal than privacy.
pros: An attractive way to divide a room for an exceptional value – room-darkening material, sturdy grommets, and an unbeatable price
Owners rave about the material's silk-like appearance
cons: Fewer available sizes than some competitors and only 3 color options
Doesn't come with the hanging pole

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Fantastic at blocking out the light as well. Here is a tip to install. I went to a fence supply store and bought a 3/8" diamiter top rail post with thick guage for about $25. I installed from wall to wall using heavy duty closet rod hangers. The walls of the post are thick so it does not sag.
customer_reviews.author: Rallybas

customer_reviews.title: Good quality fabric
customer_reviews.text: Good quality fabric, can't see through, sturdy rings at top, price at 70 for the 12.5ft is a bit too high though. The ends don't rest straight up and down, they curl a bit but it's ok for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Maio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Curtains for Church Stage/Movie Curtains
customer_reviews.text: We used these curtains for our church stage due to its non see through material. We created a pvc pipe frame to hold the curtains. The curtains looked really nice and the quality of the material felt thick and heavy. We paired it with our movie projection screen and it all looked very good together. During our shadow skit we saw no light coming through the curtains and we can't wait to use it with our black light setup too. Overall it came quickly, the fabric was perfect and we didn't even have to steam or iron the material at all. We are actually looking at purchasing more!! Super pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect, heavy duty, yet light weight enough to not sag the bar
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect, heavy duty, yet light weight enough to not sag the bar down. Covers the entire 10 foot span with plenty left over to have it hang loosely. Big hit with everyone who has seen it. Used it with RoomDividersNow Premium Tension Curtain Rod, 80in-120in (Black)
customer_reviews.author: Gramps

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I had hoped for. Except for the color.
customer_reviews.text: The color is actually dark brown, not black. I had imagined that this curtain would be some course burlap-type material, however, it's so not! It's actually quite magical! I did not need to steam or iron it, once up, it draped smooth as silk, and felt like silk! Completely blocks light, muffles sound, and keeps the heat in! And once I pulled it back, it tucked neatly out of sight. Exactly what I had hoped for. Except for the color. I bought 2. Would love one in a deep red.
customer_reviews.author: George Stoll

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric and very opaque.
customer_reviews.text: The room divider was used as an auxiliary curtain to stop light from entering a sliding glass door area that had vertical blinds hung in front of it. The room divider was attached to the vertical blind track attachment points. It worked very well except for the fact that the room divider was heavier than the verticals and bunched up when the verticals were pulled aside. There was enough room for the slider door to be freely accessed. All in all a success. the Curtain stopped 99.9% of the direct sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Barcroft

customer_reviews.title: HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL
customer_reviews.text: This curtain feels great to touch and is made of high quality material. It is thick and it is not see-through. I put this up for my RV to cover the driver and passenger section. It is also used to have some privacy when the bunk on top of the cabin is lowered. I used the room divider tension rod and the curtain fits perfectly. The color I purchased is beige and it is an exact match to my RV's sofa and dinette seats. I will be buying another one. Buy it, you will love it!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. Using it as a divider in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Using it as a divider in my shop to separate my "office" area from the rest of the workshop. It works great to keep the heat in the office area. Previously my electric heater was unable to keep the office area warm. Now the office area stays very warm. The curtain itself is 10 feet. When mounted on a 1" diameter rod it just barely spans the 9'8" wide opening between two walls upon which it is mounted. Had I known this I would have bought to 12' wide curtain to make sure there were no gaps where the curtain meets the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Fat Penguin

customer_reviews.title: It arrived a few days earlier than expected and is wonderful. The curtain is light blocking and is made ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband recently moved into a studio and decided to use the curtain for a ceiling rod as a room divider. We couldn’t find anything in our local stores that were nearly wide or tall enough for the length we wanted. We ordered this in Silver, which is a light blue-toned color. It arrived a few days earlier than expected and is wonderful. The curtain is light blocking and is made completely of fabric (does not have the white light blocking material other curtains in stores have). We definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marie K.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE These curtains! With the grommets they dont hang 7ft though. More like 6'11. They didnt end up working for the space I needed which broke my heart! I loved everything about them but had to return them for something that actually touched the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: Using at the cabin to divide sleeping areas in a big open loft. The fabric is nice and hangs well with no wrinkles. The grommets are sturdy and look like they will hold up well. Am going to have to get a pull wand though to make sliding them easier as the 8 foot height makes it a little difficult. Be sure to add width to account for the folds.
customer_reviews.author: VLDUNCAN

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't specify "blackout" but this curtain certainly is and is lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: I got my Loft back! I purchased this item to divide my bro-in-law's space from our loft. We didn't have a spare bedroom for him to stay when he moved in with us and this divider curtain worked perfect! Not only that it gives him privacy but it also allows me to have half of my loft back with my sitting area. Here's another Bonus: I know the description doesn't specify "blackout" but this curtain certainly is! No one can see through, not even lights! Take notice of the picture with the curtain open and the light shining thru the window and the one with closed curtain. Super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tacoma, WA

customer_reviews.title: This curtain is a great quality material
customer_reviews.text: This curtain is a great quality material. It's easy to hang and totally blocks the light. We purchased the light grey and it is a very true cool tone grey. We use this to block off an opening from our VERY sunny foyer to what once was an open den but we now use it as a bedroom. Helps block sound as well. We wanted the curtain to lay flat against the opening so we used thumb tacks on the inside and hung the grommets on those.
customer_reviews.author: MK Wood

customer_reviews.title: Would reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Love this curtain divider. I had a double carport converted to a big bedroom. I have 3 grandkids in it and one has requested their own room. This afforded me a very attractive cheap fix for creating a space for her. Keeps noise and light out. TY
customer_reviews.author: Bev Lohr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got the light gray and it's perfect, long at 12.5 ft wide and 8ft tall. It was perfect to divide a room. It is sturdy and not too light so it won't be sway all over the place. It's solid and barely even moves. I'm greatful to have this. One thing though, I wish they went past 8ft tall lol. But that would probably be pushing it. I'll just buy another one and put it up to the ceiling, and that will block out even more noise.
customer_reviews.author: L. Leblanc

customer_reviews.title: Not as much sound proof as we thought...
customer_reviews.text: Came as shown. Material not as thick as expected so not as much sound proofing as what we thought we were buying. We bought the 15 ft long to cover a 10 ft wide opening to give some gathering effect, hoping it would offer more privacy. Cannot see through. True to length/width. Grommets in good shape and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Reed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are a very high-quality very soft material yet very sturdy closer to the heavy side. I'm using them before my voice over Studio I attached them to the flexible ceiling track that I also purchased from Amazon and they are perfect they're little bit long to the floor but I expected that because I have a drop ceiling which is only about 7 foot after you add the hooks it made the curtains a little bit lower to the ground and they drag the floor but that's actually what I need to keep out any and all sound for my studio. I would definitely recommend of these
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Nitzband

customer_reviews.title: It is thick enough to block out at least 90% and the material feel nice and soft but not silky.
customer_reviews.text: I got this 8ft x15ft beige curtain off the second living room so my aging mom can have some privacy as she can no longer going up and down the stairs to her room. It is thick enough to block out at least 90% of the light (mine is beige, so darker color might block more light?) coming from the kitchen area and the material feel nice and soft but not silky.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: Works well, slightly darker than in photo
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had this curtain for too ling, but it does the trick well. It was slightly darker than what I was expecting but still matches our walls really well. The fabric itself is a little thin, but it's very soft to the touch and does a great job of keeping out the light. For $40, it's a great deal. Note that on our version (7' long X 9' tall), there are 14 holes for hooks. I don't know if this is standard, but it was a piece of information that might be helpful for other buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Wrenhaven

customer_reviews.title: Nice curtain, dumb description
customer_reviews.text: The curtain is NOT 15ft tall x 9ft Wide, it is 15ft Wide and 9Ft tall! This is what I was hoping for when I ordered it. It is very nice material and does an excellent job of dividing off the bedroom of a studio apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful as well as functional
customer_reviews.text: I like this curtain very much, the material is great and so pretty. We took a doorwall out to open up a sunroom, then needed a nice curtain to use when we have extra company, having a sofa bed in the room. This is perfect, just need to shorten it.
customer_reviews.author: trynlady

customer_reviews.title: Overall great and does what its supposed
customer_reviews.text: Thicc enough that you cant see through it and Thin enough that it doesnt weigh too much. fair quality as the circles tore from the fabri, but that just may be my fault for man handling it. it was a tad short but I didnt account for the length that would be taken up from it twisting on the pole it hung from. Overall great and does what its supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Tito

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful and heavy divider. It is high quality and i love it. I would recommend it to other and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha W true

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution!
customer_reviews.text: My elderly mom recently had a fall and we needed to move her down to the first floor to sleep but wanted to create a private area where her caregiver could also sleep. These room divider curtains did the job beautifully! My sister and I installed them by ourselves - we are not terribly handy, but the directions for the rod portion (purchased separately) were clear and we managed the job on our own. The fabric is substantial and hangs very nicely. I am thrilled with this purchase and would highly recommend these curtains!
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: Hides boxes well
customer_reviews.text: I wasnt sure it would work. We had a large 2nd family room and it was fulled with storage boxes. Not enough to justify paying storage fees but made the room unusuablw and an eye sore. I saw these curtains while looking for other curtains and gave it a go. So happy with our purchase. They look classy and now our room is usable and you cant see the storage boxes from floor to ceiling. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Baseball mom

customer_reviews.title: Dark gray curtain comes with brown loops?!!
customer_reviews.text: The curtain part is fine. I like the fabric.i bought the Dark gray fabric. After ordering I went to another amazon site and bought a tension pole. I thought buying the nickel color would match the gray the best. When the curtain arrived I found that the metal loops on the curtain were bronze colored! BROWN?! Not black, not gray, not silver. It looks ridiculous but I can’t be bothered returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Boston

customer_reviews.title: Great light blocking light weight curtain
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised by how much I like this curtain. It’s not heavy, but it does block light (even tho it is also a light color). We bought it to block off a room for cooling with a window AC, and it works fantastic. Have not washed it yet, so I don’t know how well it will hold up, but right now I am 100% satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sue L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect privacy curtain!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for diving the room. I use it as a privacy curtain to block off the bathroom hallway area from the bedroom area. My mother in law is disabled and the bathroom in our room is the one with the handicapped accessible shower so she’s able to go in to the bathroom without bothering us or vice versa. The layout is hard to explain. But this does what we needed it to do!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Kally

customer_reviews.title: Daylight shows through. If thicker would be 5/5
customer_reviews.text: When used a curtain for a window these do not block all day light. You will see an outline of light. At least with the "grey" color. If only they could make them a few mil thicker. The curtain is expensive so I was expecting them to be slightly thicker. Had I not heavily altered it already I would be returning this piece of fabric.
customer_reviews.author: H Frazier

customer_reviews.title: 100% Blackout!  Love these curtains!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these curtains for our at home theater room and I absolutely love them. I’ve spent a lot of money on curtains claiming to be 100% blackout and they’re not; but these are amazing. They have made a tremendous difference in my theater room. We also bought the same curtain just a difference size and used them with our room divider kit. They look great!!! Highly recommend. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Magda

customer_reviews.title: Is as advirtised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this curtain to divide a guest room I had. The length and width is perfect (I took exact measurements). You can't see to the other side of the space, if there is light on one side It still remains dark on the other, not bothering the person on the other side. I ordered the black curtain and works great with the decor in the room. I highly recommend this curtain if you're looking to divide a space.
customer_reviews.author: The Truth!

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this. My parents initially bought 2 as a divider for a room to keep the cool air out. (Worked great) I purchased it to keep storage hidden at work. Love it. The grey is very pretty and good quality fabric, too.
customer_reviews.author: meghan

customer_reviews.title: Product is Excellent to Add Privacy to a Room
customer_reviews.text: The product is well made. Light cannot seep through. The weight of it can be a little heavy when scrunched up. My curtains are held by a metal wire attached to anchors on the wall. Can’t compare to metal poles that spring out towards the walls. But excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Room Divider
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a room divider and was concern about the weight and look as you know fabrics are a hands on thing. These are very nice feel and look to them and very light weight. Very happy with these would buy again if i have a need for more. The Fitting Rings are strong and slide very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mega Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price but I’d recommend looking elsewhere for ...
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price but I’d recommend looking elsewhere for properly hemmed for 8’ ceilings and weighted at the bottom. These work, but due to dragging on the floor, the look bad. Hemming would help but then without weights will not likely stay put.
customer_reviews.author: DaGuru

customer_reviews.title: Privacy insulation and ease of install worth it
customer_reviews.text: Nice material to hang and create a private space. Bright light is managed and has a bit of sound absorbing quality about it. Soft and easy to get around a rod to hang up and privacy is created with the material and the value is shown. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Roobs

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: This fabric is so soft. The polyester ironed beautifully from the box and hangs nicely right away. I had ordered just o e panel that I was going to use to block the sun from our eyes in the late afternoon but ordered the second panel when I realized I couldn’t just slide it to the opposite side because of the center support. So pleased with the look
customer_reviews.author: dee davie

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the cold out
customer_reviews.text: We purchased to block off the stairs to our attic while we are remodeling the upstairs. We opened up a wall to access our stairs (and moved a door which originally lead to the stairs). It does a great job of keeping the heat in the living and not allowing everything to escape upstairs, while still providing easy access to the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: TW1119

customer_reviews.title: Invest in double the width you think is needed.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing wrong with the curtain, it is the size specified. After hanging it we found that “extra” curtain would be nicer, so we purchased 2. Again, the product is as described, just adding yuh may want to invest in 2 to hang together to allow for “breeze room”. The second picture is to try and show how well it blocks the light. If you can’t tell, they’re blocking EVERYTHING out, and for a light color that’s pretty amazing.
customer_reviews.author: William M McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are fantastic! They are made very durable, yet rather lightweight. They are extremely soft also. They can be used as room dividers, to close off rooms or even as blackout curtains! You definitely get your money's worth with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Karri Hoefling

customer_reviews.title: Opaque yet light-weight
customer_reviews.text: This blocks out light very well and yet it is light enough that I could attach it to the ceiling with regular curtain rods and drywall screws without worrying about the weight. The 15ft curtain was only about six pounds. I distributed the weight across two Walmart Better Homes 84” curtain rods and it worked great as a divider for my basement.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy T.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Good weight
customer_reviews.text: Used this a room separator after buying a track to connect it to. Works great. Good quality product. Material is strong but not too heavy. Satiny enough to look good, but smooth enough not to have wrinkles. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This curtain is exactly as advertised. Thick, sturdy, dark....I love it. I bought to use as a room divider for a room that was 15 ft wide. It worked great, only then I decided that I would prefer 2 curtains that opened in the middle. I cut my curtain in half and hemmed the edge to solve my problem. These curtains are all they say and more. Definitely well worth the money. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: hallshire

customer_reviews.title: Quality purchase
customer_reviews.text: This curtain is heavy duty (which is what I wanted), think and light dimming. It makes the seperation feel like another room. Would recommend to others looking for room divider.
customer_reviews.author: SarahB

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, a bit shiny and holds well.
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome. What an easy way to put up a room divider that doesn't need screws. Plus, the sheets are satin-is (semi shiny) and don't look cheap at all! I extended my rod 150 inches plus and it's able to hold without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: J.See

customer_reviews.title: Check Quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice product, however the rings in mine are tearing out in two spots. I make sure not to yank on the curtain, it rarely moves actually, but still I’m noticing it fall apart. Still serves its purpose though.
customer_reviews.author: AMBARISTA

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 13 year old and 16 year old boy sharing a room this has been amazing. It gives them the ability to feel like they have their own space and it doesnt take up much room when pulled back.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Gott

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to create and extra room in our house and love it! It looks very nice, was ready to hang right out of the bag, blocks out any light and has been a nice and affordable solution to our need for a divider.
customer_reviews.author: Ampogm

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Very much a privacy/blackout curtain. Seems pretty heavy weight and is floor to ceiling with some drag left (relatively standard height ceilings I suppose). Also love the decorative rings.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sleek!
customer_reviews.text: I use this item with a tension rod that I purchased from Amazon. I am very pleased with this purchase, as I use it to block the light from the foyer on days when I use my projector.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: You'll need to buy better dry wall anchors
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my sister and she loves it. I set it up for her. The only thing that you will need is better dry wall screws or anchors. When I first set it up I noticed some of the anchors were already coming off because the clothe is a little heavy for the anchors provided.
customer_reviews.author: Eder Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Opaque, Heavy Duty Curtains
customer_reviews.text: Excellent curtain for privacy screen or blacking out windows. Thick, good quality, and heavy. I bought two to create a room divider in a studio apartment. Completely opaque.
customer_reviews.author: Zohal Khan

customer_reviews.title: A great price for an outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: Exceeds my expectations. As you can see the room divider/curtain completely blocks out the light from the room behind it. The material feels like satin. It's medium-weight & sturdy. The grommets are very stylish and sturdy as well. Great price for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Nice Divider
customer_reviews.text: Room divider has worked well for separating my office/bedroom from the living room. The curtains were easy to put on the curtain rod I bought and give the privacy desired. They are the perfect length and are not see-through.
customer_reviews.author: J. Berkowitz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install and Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I used it to divide a large open area into smaller sections so that I don't have to heat or cool the entire area all the time. It was installed in minutes, slides easily, and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Kay Denney

customer_reviews.title: Feels soft
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking material, durable material. Cannot see through so provides good visual privacy. I use it for my dining room converted to office as a makeshift door/ wall.
customer_reviews.author: TDL

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was for my teenage son. He has his computer in a common area. This curtin gives him some privacy as well as letting me the parent keep an ear out.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your dollars
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice drapes/curtains. The quality is excellent, ot blocks the light very well and is soft to touch. Definitely will buy a second pair in a smaller size
customer_reviews.author: LAKESHA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t yet hung it up, as I’m still waiting on the rod to be delivered, but the fabric is soft and thick and seems to be of very high quality. I also only ordered a 12.5’x8’ and received a 15’x8’. I don’t need the extra couple feet right now but it might come in handy in the future, thanks for the free upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: danielle peterson

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly dividing room floor to ceiling
customer_reviews.text: Works well as a room divider. I did a lot of research looking into various ways to divide my space. I hang the curtain with a tension rod at the top of the wall just under the ceiling. The tension rod spans my two walls. The curtain works perfectly as a floor to ceiling room dividing solution. I am really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, well made.
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Quality product. The curtains are as advertised. They are thick and durable and you cannot see light through them. I am super impressed with the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Norton

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 12.5 foot Curtain and it is of great quality, it is light weight and gives you good privacy. it is not see through and the recommended rod was also great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog tested and owner approved.
customer_reviews.text: This curtain works exactly as I wanted it to. Heavy enough to stay put, light enough not to break the rod that holds it up. My dogs dont try to chew it, always an important quality.
customer_reviews.author: Monica M Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: I couldn’t be more happy.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Complete privacy and well made. Curtain rings were secure and made of metal for long lasting use. Created an instant closet in alcove in just minutes !!!! Will be purchasing another in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Wisteria strong

customer_reviews.title: I use these as curtains
customer_reviews.text: These are curtains for my AirBnb properties and they work fantastically. Keep the heat out and are black out where people can sleep comfortably. Great feel too.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Suarez

customer_reviews.title: We are using them to divide out a temporary room ...
customer_reviews.text: We are using them to divide out a temporary room for my daughter while she stays with us. They provide the privacy she needs at this time plus they are not ugly hanging downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and good thickness
customer_reviews.text: I was so thankful to find a privacy curtain that would fit an opening over 11'. This is a very durable and sturdy fabric which I know will serve my purpose excellently.
customer_reviews.author: rbogle

customer_reviews.title: The material is very soft and the quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a divider curtain for sometime now. The last curtain I had purchased was well over $200. I was excited to find this one on amazon for less then $100. This curtain was perfect for my application. The material is very soft and the quality is excellent. I was also pleased with the weight of curtain. While the material is super sturdy and thick the curtain isn't heavy. Very pleased with this product;-)
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price for the quality you get.
customer_reviews.text: These curtain/room dividers are excellent. Just as the description says. I purchased three of the black ones, to quadrant off a corner of my basement. Excellent construction, heavy duty, aesthetically appealing and you can't see any light though them. Great purchase! I'd give 10 stars. Definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great curtain!
customer_reviews.text: Great Curtain! Easy install and glides across curtain rod. Even reduces sound when closes off area!
customer_reviews.author: Steven M

customer_reviews.title: Look cant see
customer_reviews.text: Really really nice quality...can't see thru . Length was perfect even though I guessed...they are like double curtains the reason you can't see thru...I'm definitely happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Get it Girl

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are great curtains. I am using them to section off part of a large room so that we can use it as a temporary bedroom and these curtains are doing a great job. They are a good, sturdy material for the money, the color was exactly as described and they slide easily on the room-dividing curtain rod I purchased. I definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: lovetobemommy

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: Very large curtain for the price. Nice grommets to hang the curtain by. Very satisfied overall it's the curtain and the quality.
customer_reviews.author: jelaine

customer_reviews.title: WOW great buy
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I saw these listed on another review so i took purchased them. WOW, resort quality. Heavy, thick, soft..look fantastic. We love them
customer_reviews.author: Robert Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.  Much nicer material than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using for a room divider and I've only had it up since last night, it has already improved my life immensely.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie J. Guarino

customer_reviews.title: Does the job without being an eyesore.
customer_reviews.text: Seams very well made. Heavy material that looks luxurious, Using it for a house that our church uses to host homeless families so that they have some privacy. Haven't used it yet, but think it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Engleman

customer_reviews.title: Great as room divider
customer_reviews.text: Using this as a room divider. Looks good and no light gets through which is what we wanted. Grommets work well and make opening/closing our divider easy.
customer_reviews.author: Dot C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome divider
customer_reviews.text: Supeer easy to install its defenetly a blackout curtain cant see nothing through it i use it to divide my studio the living room and bedroom and it's not to heavy and gives a sophisticated look.and i saw curtains like these for triple the price this was a steal for me.
customer_reviews.author: eridania

customer_reviews.title: Color does not match in picture
customer_reviews.text: The color looks different than in the picture... has more yellow in it. Other than that the length and quality are great.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not quite 10'.
customer_reviews.text: Not quite 10' like in the description, it's about 8 1/2-9'. Good thick material, easy to hang, but the description needs to be fixed because it's pretty misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Shaelee Booth

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Curtains
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are high quality. The fabric is thick. You definitely can not see through it. I’m very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: mle721

customer_reviews.title: As described, As expected
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks exactly as what it is described on the web, 100% new, soft in texture
customer_reviews.author: Zihao Wang

customer_reviews.title: all great
customer_reviews.text: It's all great, I used it for room partition, even light does not pass through it. But I had to choose this color as much color options were not available. The color is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Dany Park

customer_reviews.title: Blacks out sun and is big enough to touch the ceiling and floor.
customer_reviews.text: Best blackout curtains I have. I use these curtains to divide my sun room from my game room, and it's prefect for blocking the sun out.
customer_reviews.author: skwirly88

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are fantastic! They are great quality, completely blocks light and cost such a great price. I love them and would definitely recommend them. I used them for the dressing room in my boutique. It looks exactly like I'd pictured it. I couldn't be happier with them.
customer_reviews.author: ang

customer_reviews.title: I temporarily share a studio with my brother. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I temporarily share a studio with my brother. I bought this because I sleep early and he stays up all night playing video games. This makes our different bedtimes allowable.
customer_reviews.author: DQ

customer_reviews.title: Completely shuts out light!  Great for dorm room
customer_reviews.text: This worked great! My daughter and her roommate in the dorm have different sleeping and studying habits. We bought this so that the room can be divided when one is sleeping and one is studying. When closed, her half of the room is completely dark
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It truly provided privacy.
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely beautiful product. Love the quality. Only issue has been the folds have not fallen out after a month but I will live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Good privacy curtain
customer_reviews.text: Nice and thick, can't see through and also is good blackout curtain. Heavy weighy fabric
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Kiyan

customer_reviews.title: It woks, as promised
customer_reviews.text: This is a great room divider. It is exactly how it was described. We are using it to convert our dinning room into a bedroom. It gives the privacy needed, but also can be pulled back to allow cross ventilation if needed. It's perfect for our needs. I recommend this product to divide your room with.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: High quality and heavy
customer_reviews.text: High quality and heavy curtains. Doesn’t seem to let light through, just as promised. And has a nice sheen to it. The grommets are pretty heavy duty. I have only had them up for a few days but will report back with any notable updates.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb G

customer_reviews.title: It fell and I’m frustrated
customer_reviews.text: Loved it at first and put up a lightweight curtain. It was as tight of a fit as was possible and fell a week later damaging the wall and the cabinet underneath it. Very frustrated and now trying to find a way to secure it to the wall so it doesn’t fall again.
customer_reviews.author: shana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Material
customer_reviews.text: Fabric very soft and block out the light. Excellent use as a room divider.
customer_reviews.author: DX

customer_reviews.title: I brought this Item for Privacy
customer_reviews.text: The curtain is very good, does not allow light to come thru. Used this as a partition for my room, while I was sharing my room with another roommate. Value for Money, good deal and you get privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Monish Gaikwad

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quality curtains
customer_reviews.text: I loved these curtains. They are rich feeling and heavy. They block out light and worked perfectly to create a semi private section in my living room for my out of town guests. Some else's review said something about the rivits but they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good curtain
customer_reviews.text: Product as described but easily stained with small kids and dirty hands so keep that in mind with light colors
customer_reviews.author: Billy Lane

customer_reviews.title: You cannot see through the curtian.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was tall enough to not see over. Gave plenty of privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Zan

customer_reviews.title: Cream ones are well made and block light
customer_reviews.text: They are nice and thick. Ordered light grey 2nd time they were not as thick and puckered a bit so I sent back
customer_reviews.author: BY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Choice room divider curtain
customer_reviews.text: Love it worked perfect for me you cannot see thru them made of high quality material and they are heavy so no need to weight down. Looks nice Would recommend highly
customer_reviews.author: Vicky L. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Absolute value for a beauty studio
customer_reviews.text: These curtains were absolutely amazing for what I needed them I have a beauty studio. It was everything I needed for privacy. Very well made. I will be ordering 3 more today.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Carmen

product_meta.title: Rose Home Fashion RHF Privacy Room Divider Curtain 8 ft Wide x 7ft Tall: No one can See Through, Total Privacy(Grey 8x7)
product_meta.description:
Color:Grey| Size:8'x7'

Rose Home Fashion:Privacy space solution for shared space

 * Great Fabric Our fabric is thick, and no one can see through, body shape hidden behind it, so total privacy space

 * 5 starts hotel' standard For the heavy of the fabric, usually there are 6 or 7 pins sewed in every inches, but we insist 10 pins the same as the 5 starts hotel's drape


If you are looking for great and cost-effective way of re-inventing the space of your home, opt for Rose home Fashion room divider curtain. They are crafted for the topmost and luxury, come with the strong grommet ring top for easy installation and smooth sliding over a rod. Each curtain panel is carefully ironed and ready to serve.

Please be Noted: Our product pictures are real and shot by professionals. However, due to differences in computer monitors display, there can be color variations between the actual product and your screen measurement.
feature_bullets: Totally Privacy - A drape you can not see through, body shape hidden behind it
Space Master - Shared bedroom, apartment, storage, studio, dorm, loft, workspace, All in one drape
Great Fabric - The color and fabric is the same on both sides, so looks great inside and out
Top Sewing standard - Every Inches 10 pins, the standard only for five star hotel's drape
Easy Care - Machine Wash and Dry. PLEASE NOTE: This product is meant for Indoor use only
